HotelDetails.propertyInformation: Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is 11 AM
HotelDetails.areaInformation: Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance. <br /><br /> Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer. <p>Aquaventure - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi <br />Lost Chambers - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi <br />Club Rush - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi <br />Skydive Dubai - 5.1 km / 3.2 mi <br />Dubai College - 5.9 km / 3.7 mi <br />American University of Dubai - 5.9 km / 3.7 mi <br />Dubai Marina - 6.1 km / 3.8 mi <br />The Beach Mall - 6.3 km / 3.9 mi <br />Yoshis Gaming Lounge - 6.4 km / 3.9 mi <br />Dubai Marina Mall - 6.5 km / 4.1 mi <br />Thrill Zone - 6.6 km / 4.1 mi <br />Emirates Golf Club - 6.9 km / 4.3 mi <br />Burj Al Arab - 7.1 km / 4.4 mi <br />Souk Madinat Jumeirah - 7.1 km / 4.4 mi <br />Wild Wadi Water Park - 7.4 km / 4.6 mi <br /></p><p>The nearest airports are:<br />Dubai (DXB-Dubai Intl.) - 27.2 km / 16.9 mi<br />Dubai (XNB-Dubai Bus Station) - 27.2 km / 16.9 mi<br />Dubai (DWC-Al Maktoum Intl.) - 27.6 km / 17.1 mi<br />Sharjah (SHJ-Sharjah Intl.) - 45.8 km / 28.5 mi<br /></p><p>The preferred airport for Atlantis The Palm is Dubai (DXB-Dubai Intl.). </p>
HotelDetails.propertyDescription: <p><b>Property Location</b> <br />With a stay at Atlantis The Palm in Dubai (Dubai Coast), you'll be minutes from Aquaventure and Lost Chambers. This 5-star hotel is within the vicinity of Ski Dubai and Mall of the Emirates.</p><p><b>Rooms</b> <br />Make yourself at home in one of the 1539 air-conditioned rooms featuring iPod docking stations and LCD televisions. Rooms have private furnished balconies or patios. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with bathtubs or showers feature rainfall showerheads and designer toiletries.</p><p><b>Amenities</b> <br />Relax at the full-service spa, where you can enjoy massages, body treatments, and facials. After dipping into one of the 2 outdoor swimming pools, you can spend some time at the private beach. Additional features at this hotel include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and an arcade/game room. Guests can get to nearby shops on the complimentary shuttle.</p><p><b>Dining</b> <br />Enjoy a meal at one of the hotel's dining establishments, which include 20 restaurants and a coffee shop/café. From your room, you can also access 24-hour room service. Relax with a refreshing drink from a poolside bar or one of the 3 bars/lounges.</p><p><b>Business, Other Amenities</b> <br />Featured amenities include a business center, limo/town car service, and express check-in. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available 24 hours), and free valet parking is available onsite.</p>
HotelDetails.roomInformation: <p><b>Know Before You Go</b> <br /><ul> <li>This property offers transfers from the airport (surcharges may apply). Guests must contact the property with arrival details 24 hours prior to arrival, using the contact information on the booking confirmation. </li> <li>Reservations are required for massage services and spa treatments. Reservations can be made by contacting the hotel prior to arrival, using the contact information on the booking confirmation. </li> <li>One child 11 years old or younger stays free when occupying the parent or guardian's room, using existing bedding. </li><li>Only registered guests are allowed in the guestrooms. </li> <li>The property has connecting/adjoining rooms, which are subject to availability and can be requested by contacting the property using the number on the booking confirmation. </li> </ul></p><p><b>Fees</b> <br /><p>The following fees and deposits are charged by the property at time of service, check-in, or check-out. </p> <ul> <li>Fee for buffet breakfast: AED 165 per person (approximately)</li> <li>Airport shuttle fee: AED 485 per vehicle (one way)</li> <li>Rollaway bed fee: AED 780.00 per night</li> </ul> <p>The above list may not be comprehensive. Fees and deposits may not include tax and are subject to change. </p></p><p><b>Mandatory Fees and Taxes</b> <br /><p>You'll be asked to pay the following charges at the property:</p> <ul><li>Tourism fee: AED 20 per accommodation, per night</li></ul> <p>We have included all charges provided to us by the property. However, charges can vary, for example, based on length of stay or the room you book. </p></p><p><b>Renovations and Closures</b> <br />The property will be renovating from 26 February 2017 to 21 March 2017 (completion date subject to change). The following areas are affected: <ul><li>Water park</li></ul> The property will be renovating from 03 June 2017 to 24 June 2017 (completion date subject to change). The following areas are affected: <ul><li>Water park</li></ul> During renovations, the hotel will make every effort to minimize noise and disturbance.</p>
HotelDetails.drivingDirections: The preferred airport for Atlantis The Palm is Dubai (DXB-Dubai Intl.) - 27.1 km / 16.9 mi. <p>Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property’s location to the point of interest or airport and may not reflect actual travel distance. <br /><br /> Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometre. </p>
HotelDetails.checkInInstructions:
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on property policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
HotelDetails.knowBeforeYouGoDescription:
• This property offers transfers from the airport (surcharges may apply). Guests must contact the property with arrival details 24 hours prior to arrival, using the contact information on the booking confirmation.
  • Reservations are required for massage services and spa treatments. Reservations can be made by contacting the hotel prior to arrival, using the contact information on the booking confirmation.
  • One child 11 years old or younger stays free when occupying the parent or guardian's room, using existing bedding.
  • Only registered guests are allowed in the guestrooms.
  • The property has connecting/adjoining rooms, which are subject to availability and can be requested by contacting the property using the number on the booking confirmation.
HotelDetails.roomFeesDescription:
The following fees and deposits are charged by the property at time of service, check-in, or check-out.

  • Fee for buffet breakfast: AED 165 per person (approximately)
  • Airport shuttle fee: AED 485 per vehicle (one way)
  • Rollaway bed fee: AED 780.00 per night

The above list may not be comprehensive. Fees and deposits may not include tax and are subject to change.
HotelDetails.mandatoryFeesDescription:
You'll be asked to pay the following charges at the property:

  • Tourism fee: AED 20 per accommodation, per night

We have included all charges provided to us by the property. However, charges can vary, for example, based on length of stay or the room you book.
HotelDetails.renovationsDescription:
The property will be renovating from 26 February 2017 to 21 March 2017 (completion date subject to change). The following areas are affected:
  • Water park
The property will be renovating from 03 June 2017 to 24 June 2017 (completion date subject to change). The following areas are affected:
  • Water park
During renovations, the hotel will make every effort to minimize noise and disturbance.
HotelDetails.locationDescription: With a stay at Atlantis The Palm in Dubai (Dubai Coast), you'll be minutes from Aquaventure and Lost Chambers. This 5-star hotel is within the vicinity of Ski Dubai and Mall of the Emirates.
HotelDetails.diningDescription: Enjoy a meal at one of the hotel's dining establishments, which include 20 restaurants and a coffee shop/café. From your room, you can also access 24-hour room service. Relax with a refreshing drink from a poolside bar or one of the 3 bars/lounges.
HotelDetails.amenitiesDescription: Relax at the full-service spa, where you can enjoy massages, body treatments, and facials. After dipping into one of the 2 outdoor swimming pools, you can spend some time at the private beach. Additional features at this hotel include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and an arcade/game room. Guests can get to nearby shops on the complimentary shuttle.
HotelDetails.businessAmenitiesDescription: Featured amenities include a business center, limo/town car service, and express check-in. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available 24 hours), and free valet parking is available onsite.
HotelDetails.roomDetailDescription: Make yourself at home in one of the 1539 air-conditioned rooms featuring iPod docking stations and LCD televisions. Rooms have private furnished balconies or patios. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with bathtubs or showers feature rainfall showerheads and designer toiletries.

RoomType.descriptionLong:
Deluxe rooms measure 506 sq feet (47 sq meters) and offer partial views of the Arabian Sea or The Palm, a balcony and a spacious bathroom which includes a walk-in rainfall shower with a separate bath, and complimentary bathroom amenities.

A king-size bed or 2 queen-size beds are available. Additional amenities include complimentary WiFi Internet access, a 32-inch flat-panel television with cable/satellite service, premium channels and pay movies, and an iPod docking station. Air-conditioning and a minibar are also provided.

Measuring 94 square meters, Terrace suite boasts a 30 square meters balcony, separate living room, and bedroom with king size bed. The Suite offers views of the Arabian Sea or The Palm and Dubai skyline.

Bathroom has a walk-in shower with separate bath and complimentary toiletries. Television comes with cable/satellite service. Minibar and coffee/tea maker are among the included amenities.

This suite includes 24-hour room service, airport pick up service, personalised check-in, in-room check-out, daily breakfast, complimentary wireless Internet access. Unlimited access to Aquaventure Waterpark and The Lost Chambers Aquarium, and preferential rates to swim with dolphins.

Measuring 101 square meters, this Executive Suite offers the perfect balance of comfort and space. Executive Suite has a bedroom with a king-size bed, a separate living room with comfortable seating, a small dining table and desk, plus a balcony with full seating and Arabian Sea or Palm Island views.

Double vanity bathrooms have a walk-in shower with separate large oval free-standing bath and complimentary toiletries.

Additional amenities include a television with cable/satellite service, a minibar, and coffee/tea maker. Other amenities include include 24-hour room service, airport pick up, in-room check-out, personalized check-in, daily breakfast, complimentary wireless Internet access, housekeeping twice a day, and unlimited access to Aquaventure Waterpark and The Lost Chambers Aquarium, and preferential rates to swim with dolphins.

Featuring a balcony with sweeping views of Palm Island or the Arabian Gulf, this room has 1 king bed or 2 queen beds dressed with premium bedding, while hypo-allergenic bedding is available on request. It measures 506 square feet (47 square meters) and includes a bathroom with a separate tub and shower with a rainfall showerhead, as well as bathrobes, slippers, and complimentary designer toiletries.

In-room amenities include a flat-screen satellite TV with premium channels and pay movies, air conditioning, a safe, ironing facilities, and an iPod® docking station. Business amenities in this room include WiFi, a direct-dial phone with voice mail, a writing desk, and a clock radio.

Indulge: enjoy exclusive all-day access to the Imperial Club Lounge, which includes complimentary breakfast, afternoon tea, and evening drinks.

Play: Plan your entire stay with the Imperial Club Concierge team, dedicated to meet your every need.

Unwind: Discover the heights of relaxation and tranquility with exclusive access to the Imperial Club Beach and ShuiQi Spa’s state-of-the-art facilities.

Connect: Be only a click away from free WiFi and access a library of newspapers and magazines using dedicated Lounge iPads®.

Priority bellman services

Free roundtrip airport transfers from Dubai International Airport are provided. Contact the property 48 hours in advance to arrange transportation.

Subject to availability. Other restrictions may apply.

Regal Suite measures 164 square meters, offering extra space and comfort. With a private terrace, separate living room, and bedroom with king size bed, it offers Palm Island and Dubai skyline views.

Private bathroom comes with walk-in shower with separate bath and complimentary toiletries. Cable/satellite television, minibar, and tea/coffee maker are among the included amenities.

Also available is complimentary airport pick up and drop off, personalized check-in, in-room check-out, daily breakfast, complimentary wireless Internet access, housekeeping twice a day. Unlimited access to Aquaventure Waterpark & Lost Chambers Aquarium.

Featuring a balcony with table and chairs, this room has 1 king bed dressed with premium bedding, while hypo-allergenic bedding is available on request. It measures 220 square meters (2368 square feet) and includes a bathroom with a separate tub and shower with a rainfall showerhead, as well as bathrobes, slippers, and complimentary designer toiletries. A 32-inch flat-panel satellite TV with premium channels, and pay movies is offered for your entertainment. Free WiFi and a writing desk, and a clock radio, air conditioning, a safe, ironing facilities, and an iPod docking station are highlights. Welcome amenities, turndown service, a minibar with complimentary bottled water and a coffee/tea maker will help you relax in the evenings. This room is non-smoking.

Room rate includes:

Free roundtrip airport transfers from Dubai International Airport. Contact the hotel in advance to confirm transportation.

1 complimentary interconnecting room per booking

In-suite check in

24-hour private butler service

2 complimentary Dolphin Encounter shallow water interactions

2 complimentary head, neck, and shoulder massages and complimentary use of steam, sauna and jet pool facilities at ShuiQi Spa

2 free 30-minute personal training sessions per stay

Complimentary private cabana at pool, Royal Beach, and Aquaventure

Free on demand in-room movie service

Complimentary daily access (10 AM-6 PM) to Atlantis Kids Club for children aged 3-9 (children ages 10-12 can choose either the Kids Club or Club Rush). Additional cost for meals.

Daily access (2-6 PM) to Club Rush for teenagers 13-18 years of age inclusive (additional cost for snacks)

Newspapers and magazines in suite

Complimentary access to Aquaventure and The Lost Chambers

Preferential rates at Dolphin Bay

25% discount on laundry and dry cleaning

Imperial Club Lounge access between 7 AM and 11 PM daily. Imperial Club food and beverage privileges include:

Light snacks, tea, coffee, juices, and soft drinks noon-2 PM

Afternoon tea 2:30-4:30 PM

Beverages and snacks 5-7 PM, choose from Nasimi Beach, Seafire, or Yuan

Evening snacks (coffee and cookies) 7:30-11 PM


Subject to availability. Other restrictions may apply.

Free WiFi, a writing desk, air conditioning, a safe, ironing facilities, and an iPod docking station are highlights. Get a good night's sleep with premium bedding, cotton linens, and blackout drapes/curtains. The private bathroom has a separate bathtub and shower with a rainfall showerhead, as well as bathrobes and slippers. Free WiFi Internet access, a 32-inch flat-panel TV offering premium channels, an iPod docking station, a minibar, and a coffee/tea maker are provided. You can request an in-room massage, and enjoy welcome amenities. Climate control, complimentary bottled water, and a direct-dial phone are included.

The Executive Club Suite boasts breathtaking views and is the ideal room for families who want to live the suite life. This expansive room measures 1,087 sq feet (101 sq meters) and has 1 king bed or 1 queen bed dressed with premium bedding.. It includes a separate living area, dining area, and a bathroom with a separate tub and shower as well as bathrobes, and slippers. Additional amenities include free WiFi, a writing desk, and a clock radio, and a 32-inch flat-panel satellite TV with premium channels. Highlights include air conditioning, a safe, ironing facilities, and an iPod docking station. Welcome amenities, a turndown service, a minibar with complimentary bottled water and a coffee/tea maker are provided.

The suite offers Imperial Club Lounge access with the following added benefits:

Featuring a master bedroom with its own majilis, lounge area, private spa tub, and balcony, this room measures 1,765 sq feet (164 sq meters) and has 1 king bed or 1 queen bed dressed with premium bedding. It includes a bathroom with a separate tub and shower, as well as bathrobes, slippers, and free designer toiletries. Business-friendly amenities include free WiFi and a writing desk.

Further highlights include air conditioning, a safe, ironing facilities, and an iPod docking station. Welcome amenities, a turndown service, a minibar with complimentary bottled water and a coffee/tea maker will help you relax in the evenings.

This spacious room has 1 king bed or 1 queen bed dressed with premium bedding, while hypo-allergenic bedding is available on request. It measures 1,012 square feet (94 square meters) and includes a separate living room, dining area, and a bathroom with a separate tub and shower, as well as bathrobes, slippers, and complimentary designer toiletries. In-room business amenities include free WiFi, a direct-dial phone with voice mail, a writing desk, and a clock radio.

A 32-inch flat-screen satellite TV with premium channels, and pay movies is available for your entertainment. In-built highlights include air conditioning, a safe, ironing facilities, and an iPod docking station. For those who enjoy the beauty of the ocean, the Ocean Deluxe Rooms are the ideal choice thanks to their breathtaking views of the Arabian Sea, which are particularly stunning at sunset. Guests can choose either a king size bed or two queen size beds.

Ocean Deluxe Rooms benefit from a balcony and a spacious bathroom which includes a walk-in rainfall shower, separate bath, and complimentary bathroom amenities.

Rooms measure 47 square meters (506 square feet), and additional amenities include complimentary WiFi Internet access, a 32-inch flat-panel television, an iPod docking station, air-conditioning, and a minibar.

Deluxe Rooms, Beach View boast unique views across Atlantis The Palm resort's 1.4 km pristine beach, The Palm and the Dubai skyline, which is breathtaking both during the day and also at night when it is illuminated.

Furnished with 2 queen beds, the Deluxe Rooms, Beach View measure 506 sq feet (47 sq meters) and benefit from a balcony; the king bed rooms feature a balcony and the double queen bed rooms offer a French balcony.

Room amenities include a spacious bathroom with a walk-in rainfall shower, a separate bathtub and free toiletries. Complimentary WiFi Internet access, a 32-inch flat-panel TV with satellite service, premium channels, and pay movies, and an iPod docking station are provided, as well as air-conditioning and a minibar.

With 3 double beds and measuring 1,593 square feet (148 sq meters), this room features partial views of the beach or sea from the comfort of a balcony or patio. Get a good night's sleep with premium bedding, cotton linens, and blackout drapes/curtains. The private bathroom has a separate bathtub and shower with a rainfall showerhead, as well as bathrobes and slippers. Free WiFi, a 32-inch flat-panel Tv offering premiumchannels, an iPod docking station, a minibar, and a coffee/tea maker are provided. You can request an in-room massage, and enjoy welcome amenities. Climate control, complimentary bottled water, and a direct-dial phone are included.

1 king bed
Features a private balcony/patio

Relax - In-room massage available
Entertainment - 32-inch flat-screen TV with premium channels and pay movies
Food & Drink - Coffee/tea maker and minibar
Sleep - Premium bedding and blackout drapes/curtains
Bathroom - Private bathroom, bathrobes, and a separate bathtub and shower with a rainfall showerhead

1 king and 2 single beds. This room measures 4618 sq feet (429 sq meters), and features a private balcony/patio with beach views. In-room massages are available, and there's complimentary WiFi Internet access and a 32-inch flat-screen TV with premium channels and pay movies. Home comforts include a coffee/tea maker and minibar, and premium bedding and blackout drapes/curtains make it easy to get a good night's sleep. The private bathroom features bathrobes and a separate bathtub and shower with a rainfall showerhead. Complimentary beverages and snacks are offered 5-7 PM; choose from Nasimi Beach, Seafire, or Yuan.

RoomType.description: Deluxe Room New Year Eve - Mandatory Gala dinner extra charges apply
RoomType.descriptionLong:
Deluxe rooms measure 506 sq feet (47 sq meters) and offer partial views of the Arabian Sea or The Palm, a balcony and a spacious bathroom which includes a walk-in rainfall shower with a separate bath, and complimentary bathroom amenities.

A king-size bed or 2 queen-size beds are available. Additional amenities include a 32-inch flat-panel television with cable/satellite service, premium channels and pay movies, and an iPod docking station. Air-conditioning and a minibar are also provided.

RoomType.description: Beach View New Year Eve - Mandatory Gala Dinner extra charges apply
RoomType.descriptionLong:
Palm Beach Deluxe Rooms boast unique views across Atlantis The Palm resort’s 1.4 km pristine beach, The Palm and the Dubai skyline, which is breathtaking both during the day and also at night when it is illuminated.

Measuring 506 sq feet (47 sq meters), Palm Beach Deluxe Rooms benefit from a balcony and a spacious bathroom which includes a walk-in rainfall shower with separate bath and complimentary bathroom amenities.

Furnished with 1 premium king bed or 2 premium queen beds, room amenities include a 32-inch flat-panel television with satellite service, premium channels, and pay movies, an iPod docking station, and wireless Internet access (surcharge). Air-conditioning and a minibar are also provided.

RoomType.description: Ocean View New Year Eve - Mandatory Gala Dinner extra charges apply
RoomType.descriptionLong:
For those who enjoy the beauty of the ocean, the Ocean Deluxe Rooms are the ideal choice thanks to their breathtaking views of the Arabian Sea, which are particularly stunning at sunset. Guests can choose either a king size bed or two queen size beds.

Ocean Deluxe Rooms benefit from a balcony and a spacious bathroom which includes a walk-in rainfall shower, separate bath, and complimentary bathroom amenities.

Rooms measure 47 square meters (506 square feet), and additional amenities include a 32-inch flat-panel television, an iPod docking station, air-conditioning, and a minibar.

RoomType.description: Imperial Club New Year Eve - Mandatory Gala Dinner extra charges apply
RoomType.descriptionLong:
Featuring a balcony with sweeping views of Palm Island or the Arabian Gulf, this room has 1 king bed or 2 queen beds dressed with premium bedding while hypo-allergenic bedding is available on request. It measures 506 square feet (47 square meters) and includes a bathroom with separate tub and shower with rainfall showerhead, bidet, makeup/shaving mirror, phone, bathrobes, slippers, scale, and complimentary designer toiletries. A flat-screen television with satellite service, premium channels, and pay movies is offered for your entertainment. There are also business amenities in this room, such as a direct-dial phone with voice mail, a writing desk, wired and wireless Internet access (surcharge), and clock radio. In-built highlights also include air conditioning, a safe, ironing facilities, and an iPod docking station.

  • Indulge: enjoy exclusive all-day access to the Imperial Club Lounge which includes complimentary breakfast, afternoon tea, and evening drinks.
  • Play: Plan your entire stay with the Imperial Club Concierge team, dedicated to meet your every need.
  • Unwind: Discover the heights of relaxation and tranquility with exclusive access to the Imperial Club Beach and ShuiQi Spa’s state-of-the-art facilities.
  • Connect: Be only a click away from complimentary high-speed internet and access a library of newspapers and magazines using dedicated Lounge iPads.
  • Priority Bellman Services
    • Subject to availability. Other restrictions may apply.

RoomType.description: Terrace Suite New Year Eve - Mandatory Gala Dinner extra charges apply
RoomType.descriptionLong:
Featuring a furnished balcony, this room has 1 king bed or 1 queen bed dressed with premium bedding, while hypo-allergenic bedding is available on request. It measures 1012 square feet (94 square meters) and includes a separate living room and a bathroom with separate tub and shower with rainfall showerhead, bidet, makeup/shaving mirror, phone, bathrobes, slippers, scale, and complimentary designer toiletries. A 32-inch flat-screen television with satellite service, premium channels, and pay movies is offered for your entertainment. There are also business amenities in this room, such as a direct-dial phone with voice mail, a writing desk, wired and complimentary wireless Internet access, and clock radio. In-built highlights also include air conditioning, a safe, ironing facilities, and an iPod docking station. Welcome amenities, turndown service, a minibar with complimentary bottled water and a coffee/tea maker will help you relax in the evenings. This room is wheelchair accessible.

Room rate includes:

  • Complimentary roundtrip airport transfers from Dubai International Airport. Contact the hotel in advance to confirm transportation.
  • Dedicated lounge check-in and check-out (in the Royal Majilis)
  • Complimentary use of steam, sauna and jet pool facilities at ShuiQi Spa
  • Two complimentary head, neck, and shoulder massages for the price of one per stay
  • One complimentary 30-minute personal training session per stay
  • Exclusive rates for cabana rentals at pool, Royal Beach, and at Aquaventure
  • Complimentary daily access to Kids Club for children 3 – 12 years of age from 10 AM - 1 PM and 2 PM - 6 PM (lunchtime meals are charged between 1 PM – 2 PM and no activities will take place during this time)
  • Complimentary 5 times a week access to Club Rush for teens 13 – 18 years of age from 2 PM - 6 PM (closed on Monday and Wednesday)
  • Priority restaurant reservations
  • Complimentary N’Dulge nightclub access (excluding certain ticketed events)
  • Complimentary Internet access in suite
  • Complimentary daily local newspaper delivered to suite
  • Complimentary access to Aquaventure and The Lost Chambers
  • Preferential rates at Dolphin Bay
  • Personalized Concierge service at the Imperial Club lounge
  • Complimentary beverages and snacks 5 PM - 7 PM, at Nasimi Beach, Seafire, or Yuan
  • International newspapers in the Imperial Club Lounges
  • Complimentary access to over 2,000 + newspapers and 1j00 magazines, from 100 countries in 56 languages using Pressreader.com during stay
    • Imperial Club Lounge access between 7 AM and 11 PM daily. Imperial Club food and beverage privileges include:
  • Light, sweet, and savory snacks, tea, coffee, juices, and soft drinks in lounges
  • Afternoon tea in one of the Imperial Club Lounges 2:30-4:30 PM daily
  • A selection of complimentary beverages and canapés, served in the lounges from 5 PM -7 PM daily
    • Subject to availability. Other restrictions may apply.

RoomType.description: Terrace Family New Year Eve - Mandatory Gala Dinner extra charges apply
RoomType.descriptionLong:
3 double beds. Measuring 1518 sq feet (141 sq meters), this room features views of the beach or sea from the comfort of a balcony or patio. Get a good night's sleep with premium bedding, cotton linens, and blackout drapes/curtains. The private bathroom has a separate bathtub and shower with a rainfall showerhead, as well as bathrobes and slippers. The 32-inch flat-panel television offers premium TV channels, and the iPod docking station makes it easy to listen to your own music. You can request an in-room massage, and enjoy welcome amenities. A minibar and a coffee/tea maker are provided. Climate control, complimentary bottled water, and a direct-dial phone are included.

Room rate includes:

  • Complimentary roundtrip airport transfers from Dubai International Airport. Contact the hotel in advance to confirm transportation.
  • Dedicated lounge check-in and check-out (in the Royal Majilis)

  • Priority restaurant reservations
  • Complimentary N’Dulge nightclub access (excluding certain ticketed events)
  • Complimentary Internet access in suite
  • Complimentary daily local newspaper delivered to suite

  • Personalized Concierge service at the Imperial Club lounge
  • Complimentary beverages and snacks 5 PM - 7 PM, at Nasimi Beach, Seafire, or Yuan

  • Complimentary access to over 2,000 + newspapers and 1j00 magazines, from 100 countries in 56 languages using Pressreader.com during stay

  • Light, sweet, and savory snacks, tea, coffee, juices, and soft drinks in lounges
